column8: nye Israel mpanyimfo mu eduosuon; na hom nkɔsɔr wɔ ekyirekyir:"

column2: "na Moses nko ntwe mbɛn EWURADZE; na hɔn dze
column3: mma wɔnntwe mmbɛn; nkyii so mma ɔman no nnye no mmfow nnkɔ."

column2: "Na Moses bae bɛkaa EWURADZE ne nsɛm no nyinara kyerɛɛ ɔman no
column3: na atsɛmbu no nyinara: na ɔman no nyinara dze ndze kor buae
column5: Nsɛm a EWURADZE aka no nyinara yɛbɛyɛ."

column2: "Na Moses kyerɛɛw EWURADZE ne nsɛm no nyinara
column4: na osii afɔrmbukyia wɔ bepɔw no ase
column6: dɛ mbrɛ Israel ebusuakuw duebien no ano tse."

column2: "Na ɔsomaa Israelmba no mu mberantsɛ a wɔdze anantwi kɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr
"Na Moses faa bɔgya no ne fa guguu mbɛɛsen mu
column3: na ɔdze bɔgya fa no petsee afɔrmbukyia no do."
na ɔkenkaan no wɔ ɔman no asomu: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Dza EWURADZE aka no nyinara yɛbɛyɛ

column3: na ɔdze petsee ɔman no do
column5: Hwɛ ahyɛmu a EWURADZE nye hom edzi wɔ nsɛm yi nyinara ho no no bɔgyaa nye yi."

column6: nye Israel mpanyimfo mu eduosuon no fowee kɔree:"

column2: "na wohun Israel Nyankopɔn no; n'anan ase tse dɛ wɔdze hoabo ataa hɔ
column3: na n'enyi tsew dɛ ɔsor noara."

column2: "Na ɔammfa ne nsa annto Israelmba mu ekunyin no do: na wɔhwɛɛ Nyankopɔn

column3: Fow bra me nkyɛn wɔ bepɔw no do
column4: na tsena hɔ: na medze abopon
column5: nye mbrasɛm a makyerɛw no mebɛma wo

column3: ɔnye no somfo Josua: na Moses fowee kɔr Nyankopɔn ne bepɔw no do."
Hom ntsintsim ha ntweɔn hɛn ma onkodu dɛ yɛbɛba hom nkyɛn bio: na hwɛ
column4: Aaron nye Hur nye hom wɔ ha: obiara a ɔwɔ asɛm bi no

column2: "Na Moses fowee kɔr bepɔw no do
column3: na mununkum no bɛkataa bepɔw no do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'enyimnyam bɛtsenaa bepɔw Sinai do
column3: na mununkum no kataa do nda esia: na da a otsia esuon no
column4: ofi mununkum no mu frɛɛ Moses."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n'enyimnyam no hwɛbea ɔtse dɛ gya a ɔhyew adze wɔ bepɔw no etsifi wɔ Israelmba no enyiwa mu."
"Na Moses kɛhɛɛn mununkum no ne finimfin
column3: na ɔfowee kɔr bepɔw no do: na Moses dzii bepɔw no do adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa."
